registerSubscriber

public java.util.List<PublisherIdentifier> registerSubscriber(SubscriberIdentifier subscriberIdentifier)
Subscribe the caller to the specified topic. In addition to receiving a list of current publishers, the subscriber will also receive notifications of new publishers via the publisherUpdate API.

Parameters:
subscriberIdentifier -
Returns:
Publishers is a list of XMLRPC API URIs for nodes currently publishing the specified topic.

unregisterSubscriber

public int unregisterSubscriber(SubscriberIdentifier subscriberIdentifier)

registerPublisher

public java.util.List<SubscriberIdentifier> registerPublisher(PublisherIdentifier publisher)
Register the caller as a publisher the topic.

Returns:
List of current subscribers of topic in the form of XML-RPC URIs.

unregisterPublisher

public int unregisterPublisher(PublisherIdentifier publisherIdentifier)

lookupNode

public SlaveIdentifier lookupNode(GraphName slaveName)
Returns a SlaveIdentifier for the node with the given name. This API is for looking information about publishers and subscribers. Use lookupService instead to lookup ROS-RPC URIs.

Parameters:
slaveName - name of node to lookup
Returns:
a SlaveIdentifier for the node with the given name

lookupService

public ServiceIdentifier lookupService(GraphName service)
Lookup the provider of a particular service.

Parameters:
service - Fully-qualified name of service
Returns:
service URI that provides address and port of the service. Fails if there is no provider.
